exception.name: ErrorSigningEventDataFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the determination of the log message parts for the event data by the Secure Element failed.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorSigningEventDataFailed that is thrown if the determination of the log message parts for the event data by the Secure Element failed.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when Secure Element signing of event data fails
specification.applicability: Transaction and logging operations requiring signatures
